original_text: Now this is what you are to do: A third of you priests and Levites who are going on duty on the Sabbath are to keep watch at the doors,
korean_text: 이제 너희는 이와 같이 행하라 너희 제사장들과 레위 사람들 곧 안식일에 당번인 자들의 삼분의 일은 문을 지키고

sentences.original_text: Now this is what you are to do:
sentences.korean_translation: 이제 너희가 해야 할 일은 이것이다:

sentences.original_text: A third of you priests and Levites
who are going on duty on the Sabbath
are to keep watch at the doors,
